name: Triple Whale
pricingNote: Starts at $129/month, scales with ad spend
description: Triple Whale is a multi-touch attribution platform for e-commerce brands. It offers detailed attribution modeling, creative analytics, and customer journey tracking.

faqs.q: Is Triple Whale worth it?
faqs.a: Triple Whale offers powerful features but at a premium price. For brands spending $100K+/month on ads, the detailed attribution may justify the cost. For smaller brands, metricx provides similar core insights at 77% lower cost.

faqs.q: Why choose metricx over Triple Whale?
faqs.a: metricx offers the same essential analytics (ROAS tracking, unified dashboard, Shopify integration) at $29.99/month vs $129+. Plus, our AI Copilot lets you ask questions in plain English instead of clicking through complex dashboards.

name: Northbeam
description: Northbeam is an enterprise marketing analytics platform focused on multi-touch attribution and media mix modeling for large brands and agencies.

faqs.q: Who should use Northbeam?
faqs.a: Northbeam is best for large brands spending $1M+/month on ads who need enterprise attribution and have dedicated analytics teams. For most e-commerce brands, it's overkill and overpriced.

faqs.q: What's a good Northbeam alternative?
faqs.a: metricx provides the core analytics most brands need (unified dashboard, ROAS tracking, AI insights) at 94% lower cost. You get 80% of the value for 6% of the price.

name: Madgicx
pricingNote: Based on ad spend, starts at $79/month
description: Madgicx is an AI-powered advertising platform focused primarily on Meta Ads optimization with automation features and creative analytics.

faqs.q: Is Madgicx good for Google Ads?
faqs.a: Madgicx is primarily built for Meta Ads. If you run both Meta and Google Ads, metricx provides better cross-platform analytics in one unified dashboard.

faqs.q: Madgicx vs metricx: which is better?
faqs.a: Madgicx excels at Meta Ads automation. metricx provides unified analytics across all platforms with AI-powered insights. If you run multi-platform campaigns, metricx offers better value.

name: Hyros
description: Hyros specializes in ad tracking and attribution for info products, courses, and high-ticket items with print tracking technology.

faqs.q: Should I use Hyros for my Shopify store?
faqs.a: Hyros is optimized for info products and high-ticket items, not typical e-commerce. For Shopify stores, metricx offers better integration and e-commerce-specific analytics at a fraction of the cost.

name: Rockerbox
description: Rockerbox is an enterprise marketing attribution and measurement platform offering multi-touch attribution, media mix modeling, and incrementality testing.

faqs.q: Do I need Rockerbox for my e-commerce brand?
faqs.a: Unless you're spending $500K+/month on ads with a dedicated analytics team, Rockerbox is likely overkill. metricx provides the core analytics most brands need at 97% lower cost.

name: Wicked Reports
description: Wicked Reports provides attribution tracking focused on first-party data with cohort analysis and LTV tracking capabilities.

faqs.q: Is Wicked Reports good for Shopify?
faqs.a: Wicked Reports offers Shopify integration, but at $250+/month, it's expensive for the features. metricx provides similar core tracking with modern AI features at 88% lower cost.

name: Cometly
pricingNote: Starts at $99/month, scales with ad spend
description: Cometly is an ad tracking and attribution platform that uses first-party data to track conversions across ad platforms.

faqs.q: Cometly vs metricx: which is better value?
faqs.a: Both offer first-party tracking, but metricx includes AI-powered insights and flat-rate pricing at $29.99/month vs Cometly's $99+ that scales with spend. metricx offers better value for growing brands.

name: SegMetrics
description: SegMetrics provides marketing attribution and customer journey analytics focused on info products, courses, and subscription businesses.

faqs.q: Is SegMetrics good for Shopify stores?
faqs.a: SegMetrics is designed for info products and courses, not e-commerce. For Shopify stores, metricx provides purpose-built e-commerce analytics at 83% lower cost.
